doc.title: Kill Your Idols
doc.plot: Alex Thursby's phenomenal career as a child film star was too much for a young boy to handle. Arrogance and vices put paid to his career and his cash. Following a humiliating appearance on a national TV show, Alex plans a trip through Sri Lanka with some friends. The group is kidnapped by a terrorist organisation and a horrific ordeal ends with Alex in the hands of the police, two of his friends dead and the other missing. Alex returns home to a media circus and is seemingly convinced to take the opportunity and get his career going again. With his life apparently back on track, paranoia begins to creep into every aspect of Alex's life until he discovers that someone is after him. Alex knows there is only one course of action left open to him...
